actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on District of Columbia.

official_title: Disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the Closing of a Public Alley and Establishment of an Easement in Square 253, S.O. 88-107, Act of 1994.

summary.text: Disapproves the Act approved by the District of Columbia Council on February 7, 1995, providing for the Closing of a Public Alley and Establishment of an Easement in Square 253, S.O. 88-107.

titles.title: Disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the Closing of a Public Alley and Establishment of an Easement in Square 253, S.O. 88-107, Act of 1994.
